description:
goprotobuf: GetExtension now returns a specific error when the requested extension is missing.

Also tidy up property parsing a little bit.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

goprotobuf: GetExtension now returns a specific error when the requested extension is missing.

Also tidy up property parsing a little bit.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
